title: A Pastor’s Reflection On The Invasion Of Ukraine | Unapologetic #70
itunes:title: A Pastor’s Reflection On The Invasion Of Ukraine | Unapologetic #70
description: In late Feb of 2022, Putin shocked the world by invading its neighbor, Ukraine. We reflect on this conflict and examine it from a pastoral perspective.
